transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Ye IndiaMART customer care se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun, bataiye.
Executive: Customer care se baat kar rahe hain na aap?
Customer: Main IndiaMART se Akshay baat kar raha tha main account manager naam hai.
Customer: Bataiye. Customer care se baat kar rahe hain aap? Mujhe complaint likhwani hai. Main Shane Enterprises se baat kar rahi hun. Maine order diya tha ye Hemkund Industries Ludhiana wale ko.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Kam se kam 20-25 din ho gaye na koi phone uthane ko tayar hai unke yahan. Agar main direct website se bhi call karti hun unhe IndiaMART se bhi to phone utha ke rakh dete hain koi bolta nahi hai. Paise pure diye hue hain maine bhi GST di hui hai.
Executive: Okay. Are lagatar karunga sir aap. Ab aap log apni side se unhe call karein.
Customer: Hemkund India karke. Iski information aap mujhe forward kar sakte hain meri email ID pe. Jo aapne payment kari hai jis number pe aapki baat hui hai. So that main uski un company ke khilaf details dal ke unko khol paun. Matlab number ke khilaf information.
Customer: Hemkund Industries ye Ludhiana se hai aap search kariye na. Hamari to complaint ekdam ho jati hai jab customer hamari karte hain to.
Executive: Mam customer se puri information li jati hai na uske baad hi hota hai ye. Hum kisi basis pe jab bataoge ki company kya hai, name kya hai, details kya hai.
Customer: Sab pata hai sir main Hemkund Industry aap kaho to aapko payment ka screenshot dalti hun main.
Executive: Haan sir mujhe mujhe whatsapp kar do na. Screenshot lene ka. Number dijiye na aap mujhe aapka.
Executive: Lo na 8285.
Customer: Akshay Akshay naam hai na aapka? Haan mam ji. Aapka number hai na Akshay mere paas? Haan ji. Chaliye main abhi aapko whatsapp karke direct call karti hun.
Executive: Hi dal diya maine aapko. Mere ko detail do to main open karta hun.
Customer: Sir aap aaj hi karao apni taraf se unhe call karao kyunki maine bhi dusron ka order pakda hua hai mujhe wahan se pareshan kar rahe hain bahut jyada.
Executive: Theek hai mujhe detail do main aapke liye complaint kholta hun mam jaldi jaldi.
Customer: Ye dekho with GST maine unhe pura ka pura payment kiya hua hai.
Executive: Pehle bhi deal banai thi aapne inse kabhi?
Customer: Haan main maine pehle bhi liya bas jab bhi liya jabhi unhone pareshan hi kiya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ye dekhiye pura payment dala hua hai maine unhe GST dali hui hai aur ye chair hai lekin na koi phone utha raha aur IndiaMART se bhi agar phone karti hun na to phone utha ke ek side rakh dete hain koi nahi bolta.
Executive: Okay. Company ka naam kya hai Hemkund India unka phone number hai jis number se baat ho rahi hai jis number se.
Customer: Number to hai kyun nahi hai main dalti hun number aapko. Contact details dono mujhe aap. De rahi hun. Waise registered company hai unki IndiaMART par bhi. Haan haan wo bilkul. 140000 matlab approximately ₹51000 aap unko de chuke hain correct?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek 40000 ka payment diya ek 16000 ka diya 56. Haan ji. Sorry. 56 aur 4 ka koi. Haan ji ke bhejna sir aapka number ekdam. Mera number 8285. Kya mil gaya? Nahi koi nahi mil gaya. Do number hain unke. Lijiye. Ye to band hi kar rakha hai unhone apna number.
Customer: Mujhe jawab dena bhari ho raha hai unhe wo is isi liye aaye hue hain jinka saman hai.
Customer: Hai abhi to.
Customer: De do mujhe de do bas nikalna hai mujhe.
Customer: Kitni der mein bata rahe hain sir aap mujhe?
Executive: Mam main unko call karta hun aapke side se. Apni aapke liye. Call karke puchta hun unse.
Executive: Kis number pe pehle number pe baat kariye Syed Hemkund wale pe baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Order not fulfilled by Hemkund Industries.

- No response from the supplier despite payment.

- Wants IndiaMART to call the supplier.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for payment details and contact.

- Executive assured to call the supplier.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the supplier.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- order, refund, supplier, payment, gst
